api/KaijuSolutions.Agents.html.title: Namespace KaijuSolutions.Agents | Kaiju Multiplayer Engine
api/KaijuSolutions.Agents.html.keywords: Namespace KaijuSolutions.Agents Core Kaiju Agents functionality. Classes Distance3Sorter Sort by distance across all axes. DistanceSorter Sort by distance. KaijuAgent Base Kaiju Agent class. KaijuAgents General Kaiju Agents functions. KaijuAgentsManager Manager agents. KaijuBehaviour Base extended behaviour providing convenient helpers methods, mainly in relation to position and orientation. KaijuCharacterAgent Kaiju Agent which moves via a chracter controller . KaijuNavigationAgent Kaiju Agent which moves via a navigation mesh agent . KaijuRadiusAgent An agent type which tries to get its radius from colliders or otherwise manually assigns them. KaijuRigidbodyAgent Kaiju Agent which moves via a rigidbody . KaijuTransformAgent Kaiju Agent which moves via the transform . Enums KaijuAgentType The type of agent to spawn. Delegates KaijuAction An empty action. KaijuAgentAction An action for an agent. KaijuAgentMovementAction An action for an agent and a movement. KaijuAgentSensorAction An action for an agent and a sensor. KaijuBehaviourAction An action for a behaviour. KaijuMovementAction An action for a movement. KaijuSensorAction An action for a sensor.

api/KaijuSolutions.Agents.Movement.html.title: Namespace KaijuSolutions.Agents.Movement | Kaiju Multiplayer Engine
api/KaijuSolutions.Agents.Movement.html.keywords: Namespace KaijuSolutions.Agents.Movement Movement functionality for Kaiju Agents. Classes KaijuApproachingMovement Base movement class for moving towards a single target. KaijuAreaMovement Movement which looks for handling other agents in a given area. KaijuEvadeMovement Evade steering behaviour. KaijuFleeMovement Flee steering behaviour. KaijuLeavingMovement Base movement class for moving away from a single target. KaijuMovement Base movement class. KaijuMovementManager Cache movement objects for reuse. KaijuObstacleAvoidanceMovement Obstacle avoidance steering behaviour. KaijuPursueMovement Pursue steering behaviour. KaijuSeekMovement Seek steering behaviour. KaijuSeparationMovement Separation steering behaviour. KaijuTargetMovement Base movement class for moving in relation to a single target. KaijuWanderMovement Wander steering behaviour.
